item.title: A 'short strangle' options trade for a stock trapped in a trading range
item.description: Michael Khouw goes through the basics of a strangle options trade and how this software stock could be a good candidate for one.

item.title: Eric Jackson, who led Opendoor meme rip, has a new pick he calls the 'Shopify of mortgages'
item.description: The EMJ Capital founder called Better Home "the Shopify of mortgages" and said the company is rebuilding a $15 trillion industry from scratch with AI.

item.title: Morgan Stanley raises Applied Materials rating, sees another 10% upside
item.description: The Wall Street investment bank is more confident in the semiconductor wafer fab equipment market.

item.title: Piper Sandler raises Tesla price target to $500, says it can fight off China competitors with AI lead
item.description: Piper Sandler raised its price target for Tesla to $500 from $400, citing the EV maker's lead in AI as a catalyst for its growth.

item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades ASML, says AI tailwinds will boost the stock
item.description: The investment firm upgraded ASML to overweight from equal weight.
